VIII.iv.2.B.4.c
.
Records Relating to the FPOW Status of Veterans of the KC
The NARA Center for Electronic Records
handles requests for records relating to the FPOW status of Veterans of the KC, and
has custody of the casualty lists that indicate FPOW status.
Important
:  NARA will
not
release this information to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).  To obtain this information, the claimant must request it directly from NARA.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
